data.title: Academy of Canadian Cinema & Television
data.meta_description: The Canadian Academy | Canadian Screen Awards
data.text:
Get Inspired.

Take a look at our Academy Programming to see what other Canadian creators are making

Scroll Academy Programming

Misdirect: The Nick Nemeroff Comedy Grant, is a new grant administered by the Academy of Canadian Cinema & Television that will see a Canadian comedian awarded $10,000.00 cash, meant to be put towards their next television special, album, or other related comedy initiative.

The WBD Access x Canadian Academy Directors Program is a talent roster initiative focused on experienced Canadian directors from underrepresented communities.

The WBD Access x Canadian Academy Writers Program is a professional development initiative focused on experienced Canadian writers from underrepresented communities.

The Canadian Academy Women in Post program provides higher-level industry access and professional development for emerging to mid-level creatives working in all areas of post production.

The Canadian Academy's Executive Residency Program is an initiative dedicated to providing industry access for mid-career professionals from underrepresented communities matching high-level executives with emerging leaders to develop their creative, business and leadership skills, and make meaningful connections in the industry.

Bringing filmmakers and recording artists together through music video production grants of up to $15,000

A year-round professional development series, Academy Talks events feature moderated panels and special guest speakers sharing insight on their creative strategies, innovative business approaches, and industry leadership.
